function.name: encode_message
function.description: Encodes a given message by shifting each letter by a specified number of places down the alphabet. Wraps around the alphabet if the shift goes beyond 'z'. Ideal for simple encryption or obfuscating text. Non-alphabetic characters are left unchanged.

message.description: A string representing the message to be encoded. It is a required parameter.

shift.description: (Optional) An integer indicating how many places to shift each letter. Defaults to 1 if not specified.
